√paṇ 'bargain'

present: [1.] paṇate etc. B.+  paṇati etc. E.+  

[perfect: peṇe  apīpaṇat  apaṇiṣṭa  paṇiṣyate  paṇitā  ]

verbal: paṇita  paṇitvā  

secondary: passive: paṇyate etc.   -- intensive: pampaṇ-   -- desiderative: pipaṇiṣa-   -- causative: paṇayati etc.  pāṇayati  

derivatives: paṇa AV.+  -paṇin C.  páṇya B.+  páṇana B.+  paṇī́ V.+  paṇāyya B.  vaṇíj? V.+  paṇitṛ C.  -pāṇa AV.  pāṇí? V.+  paṇayitṛ C.
